unnormalised: The Maharashtra State CET Cell just announced that hall tickets for the MAH-MBA/MMS CET 2024 exam are now live! You can download them from their official website using your application no. and date of birth. Make sure you do it ASAP!
normalised: The Maharashtra State C-E-T Cell just announced that hall tickets for the M-A-H-M-B-A slash M-M-S C-E-T two thousand and twenty four exam are now live! You can download them from their official website using your application number and date of birth. Make sure you do it A-S-A-P!

unnormalised: Apparently, a bunch of candidates were facing issues logging in using their registration IDs like MBA24123456 or similar. CET Cell has advised everyone to double-check their credentials and internet connectivity before trying again. Plus, remember to carry a valid photo ID - like your Aadhaar no. 9876-5432-1012 or PAN card XYZPD1234A - along with your hall ticket to the exam center.
normalised: Apparently, a bunch of candidates were facing issues logging in using their registration I-Ds like M-B-A two four one two three four five six or similar. C-E-T Cell has advised everyone to double-check their credentials and internet connectivity before trying again. Plus, remember to carry a valid photo I-D - like your Aadhaar number nine eight seven six dash five four three two dash one zero one two or P-A-N card X-Y-Z-P-D one two three four A - along with your hall ticket to the exam center.

unnormalised: The exam dates are set for March 9th, 10th, and 11th, 2024. Each test taker is also assigned a unique roll no. like 24MMS00789 to identify them in the examination hall. Best of luck to everyone preparing for the CET!
normalised: The exam dates are set for March ninth, tenth, and eleventh, two thousand and twenty four. Each test taker is also assigned a unique roll number like two four M-M-S zero zero seven eight nine to identify them in the examination hall. Best of luck to everyone preparing for the C-E-T!

unnormalised: BTW, I heard from a friend that he had trouble remembering his password. He contacted the helpdesk with his registered mobile no. and they sorted it out pretty quickly. So, don't panic if you forget anything, there are options available to help ya!
normalised: B-T-W, I heard from a friend that he had trouble remembering his password. He contacted the helpdesk with his registered mobile number and they sorted it out pretty quickly. So, don't panic if you forget anything, there are options available to help ya!
